security: Releasing Agent Report, DA FORM 341, DATED 22 SEPTEMBER 1982, SUBMITTED BY MR RAÚL J. LOZANO, 902d MI GROUP CONCERNING JOSEPH TINIOTHY WHITE, TO MR NORVAL (NMIN) WHITE JR.
summary: Henry D. Glaister authorizes the release of an agent report concerning Joseph Timothy White to Norval White Jr., the father of Joseph Timothy White, in a sworn statement.
summary_one_paragraph: On October 3, 1982, in Columbia, Missouri, Henry D. Glaister, a CPT in the FA, residing at 812 Maplewood Dr, Columbia, Missouri, provided a sworn statement authorizing the release of Agent Report, DA Form 341, dated September 22, 1982, submitted by Mr. Raúl J. Lozano of the 902d MI Group, concerning Joseph Timothy White, to Mr. Norval White Jr., who is identified as the father of Joseph Timothy White.
title: Sworn Statement
